params.remote_contact_address_template:
{{firstname}} {{lastname}}{{if street}}
{{street}}{{/if street}}
{{if city}}{{city}}, {{/if city}}{{if region}}{{region}}, {{/if region}}{{if postcode}}{{postcode}}{{/if postcode}}{{if country_id}}
{{country_id}}{{/if country_id}}{{if telephone}}
T: {{telephone}}{{/if telephone}}{{if fax}}
F: {{fax}}{{/if fax}}
params.promotion_shoppingcartprice_coupons_form: {{order_number}}. {{coupon_code}}: {{if coupon_used}}Used in {{times_used}} time(s){{/if coupon_used}}{{if coupon_not_used}}Not used{{/if coupon_not_used}}
